name: Space Royal
description:
Sci-fi Shoot 'Em Up with VS mode for 2(recommended) or 4 players (if you have got good keyboard) it's kind of demo version of this project will be further developed and released on steam in future (probably under a new name xD)

You and your friend(enemy) take control over a space ship and fight waves of enemies until you meet at the center of the battleground and together try to take down "space potato boss ship thing". If you succeed on this task there is no time to celebrate because now you need to fight with this other player(if he is still alive).

Project was created as a part of Space Jam IV(theme "Space Royal" thus original title) and further developed after the game jam.

This is NOT version that was judged on event.

This build includes:
- Various graphic improvements
- Better game balance and less buggy build
- New enemies and game mechanics
